var ESBError = inputMessage.ToObject <dynamic> (); context.Instance.TraceInformation ("Reading Environment Variables"); var emailList = context.EnvironmentVariables["DefaultAdminEmailAddressString"]; var emailSender = context.EnvironmentVariables["SmtpSendAddress"]; var sourceID = ESBError.EndpointAddress; var action = ESBError.ESBAction; var creationDate = ESBError.MessageDate; var messageID = ESBError.TransactionID; var emailSubject = string.Format("A System Error Has Occurred on Neo PLM Integration Endpoint: {0} Method: {1}", sourceID, action); var body = new System.Text.StringBuilder(); body.AppendLine(string.Format("A Message {0} arrived on: {1} Method : {2} at {3}. \n", messageID, sourceID, action, creationDate)); body.AppendLine(string.Format("It could not be delivered, after multiple delivery attempts. \n")); string error = ESBError.ErrorMessage.ToString(); if (error.Contains("The REST Service call returned an HTTP Status Code '400' that violates the established service policy")) { body.AppendLine(string.Format("There is something wrong with this message. It will be abandoned by the integration.")); } else { body.AppendLine(string.Format("This message will be put on the retry queue.")); body.AppendLine ("\r\n"); body.AppendLine(string.Format("Please ensure the availability of Neo PLM and its web services and perform any recommended recovery activities.")); } body.AppendLine ("\r\n"); body.AppendLine (string.Format("Error Details \n")); body.AppendLine (ESBError.ErrorMessage.ToString()); context.Instance.TraceInformation(string.Format("Sending email '{2}' from {0} to {1}",emailSender,emailList,emailSubject)); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "To", emailList); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "From", emailSender); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Subject", emailSubject); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Body", body.ToString()); // Attach the original message as an attachment context.Data.Text = ESBError.OriginalMessage.ToString(); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Filename", "OriginalMessage.xml"); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "BodyAsAttachment", true.ToString()); context.Instance.TraceInformation (body.ToString()); //Save the Error Type as a context parameter context.Properties.Add
